TestCase.name: testPandasProcTimeBoundedPartitionedRangesOver
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$1], _c1=[AS(*org.apache.flink.table.planner.runtime.utils.JavaUserDefinedAggFunctions$PandasAggregateFunction*($0, $2) OVER (PARTITION BY $1 ORDER BY PROCTIME() NULLS FIRST RANGE 10000 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'_c1')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[b, w0$o0 AS _c1]) +- PythonOverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[$3 ASC], window=[ RANG BETWEEN 10000 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[a, b, c, $3, PandasAggregateFunction(a, c) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME() AS $3]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testPandasProcTimeBoundedPartitionedRowsOver
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$1], _c1=[AS(*org.apache.flink.table.planner.runtime.utils.JavaUserDefinedAggFunctions$PandasAggregateFunction*($0, $2) OVER (PARTITION BY $1 ORDER BY PROCTIME() NULLS FIRST ROWS 10 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'_c1')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[b, w0$o0 AS _c1]) +- PythonOverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[$3 ASC], window=[ ROWS BETWEEN 10 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[a, b, c, $3, PandasAggregateFunction(a, c) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c, PROCTIME() AS $3]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testPandasRowTimeBoundedPartitionedRangesOver
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$1], _c1=[AS(*org.apache.flink.table.planner.runtime.utils.JavaUserDefinedAggFunctions$PandasAggregateFunction*($0, $2) OVER (PARTITION BY $1 ORDER BY $3 NULLS FIRST RANGE 10000 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'_c1')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[b, w0$o0 AS _c1]) +- PythonOverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[rowtime ASC], window=[ RANG BETWEEN 10000 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[a, b, c, rowtime, PandasAggregateFunction(a, c) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testPandasRowTimeBoundedPartitionedRowsOver
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$1], _c1=[AS(*org.apache.flink.table.planner.runtime.utils.JavaUserDefinedAggFunctions$PandasAggregateFunction*($0, $2) OVER (PARTITION BY $1 ORDER BY $3 NULLS FIRST ROWS 10 PRECEDING), _UTF-16LE'_c1')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[b, w0$o0 AS _c1]) +- PythonOverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[rowtime ASC], window=[ ROWS BETWEEN 10 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[a, b, c, rowtime, PandasAggregateFunction(a, c) AS w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c, rowtime])
